item.title: Climate 21: what it says about forest carbon
item.description: Word cloud for the Climate 21 Project Transition Memo-Department of Agriculture. There’s a transition coming to the White House, and forests and climate change will be a large part of it. In late 2020, the Climate 21 Project drafted a series of transition memos highlighting recommendations and opportunities related to climate change and the federal government’s response. The Climate 21 Project includes the insights of over 150 experts with government expertise related to climate change.
